item.title: WLFI pin price on Hyperliquid touches $0.39, representing approximately a 25% premium compared to CEX.
item.description: On August 27th, based on market data, the WLFI price on Hyperliquid reached $0.39. Currently, it is trading at $0.34. And the pre-market contract price on Binance is currently $0.269.

item.title: A whale has shorted XPL and WLFI on Hyperliquid, with an unrealized loss of $1.4 million.
item.description: On August 27th, as monitored by lookonchain, a whale address beginning with 0x54d7 took short positions on XPL with 2x leverage and WLFI with 3x leverage on Hyperliquid. This led to a loss of more than $1.4 million. The liquidation prices are as follows: XPL: $2.2866; WLFI: $1.1172.

item.title: An BTC Whale Deposits 750 BTC into Binance After Holding for 12 Years, Achieving a 907x Return on Investment
item.description: On August 27th, as monitored by The Data Nerd, a BTC whale deposited 750 BTC into Binance after holding it for 12 years. This is equivalent to approximately $83.11 million. 12 years ago, their entry price was only around $122. The realized profit on these 750 BTC is $83 million, resulting in an investment return of 907 times.

item.title: Metaplanet plans to raise $881 million to accumulate more Bitcoin in October and September.
item.description: August 27th: The publicly traded Japanese company Metaplanet announced that it intends to raise funds through an international stock offering. The expected net proceeds from the international offering are approximately 130.334 billion Japanese yen (about 881 million USD), which are intended for:· Purchasing Bitcoin: 123.818 billion Japanese yen (837 million USD)· Bitcoin financial operations: 6.516 billion Japanese yen (44 million USD)Metaplanet stated that due to Japan's current severe economic situation, including high national debt, long-term real negative interest rates, and the continuous depreciation of the yen. As disclosed in the May 13, 2024 publication "Metaplanet's Strategic Financial Transformation and Bitcoin Adoption", the company has adjusted its financial management policy by strategically positioning Bitcoin (BTC) as its primary reserve asset. This decision aims to hedge against the asset risks caused by yen depreciation and leverage Bitcoin's long-term appreciatio

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Dexlab (XLAB) on August 29th.
item.description: August 27th: As per official channels, Binance Alpha is set to list Dexlab (XLAB) on August 29th.Qualified users can access the Alpha event page once Alpha trading commences and receive an airdrop by using Alpha Points. Further details will be disclosed at a later time.

item.title: Hyperliquid Platform XPL Contract 24-hour Trading Volume Surpasses $158 Million, Funding Rate Reaches 0.15%
item.description: On August 27th, on the Hyperliquid platform, the perpetual contract XPL is currently priced at $0.84. The 24-hour trading volume exceeds $158 million, the open interest is approximately $50.5 million, and the funding rate is about 0.15%.In earlier news, there was a large-scale sniper attack on XPL in the market: four major addresses coordinated an attack on short hedges, with a total profit of around $46.1 million. The leading address 0xb9c…6801e accumulated multiple long positions since August 24th and made a large buy order to clear the order book at 05:35 this morning. It realized a profit of about $16 million within a minute. The other three addresses closed their positions successively after the price surged. Currently, the leading address still holds approximately $11.43 million worth of XPL in a 1x long position, with an unrealized profit of around $3.35 million.

item.title: Swedish company H100 Group has increased its position by 46.22 BTC, bringing the total holdings to 957.5 BTC
item.description: On August 27th, the Swedish company H100 Group announced that it had increased its holdings of Bitcoin by purchasing 46.22 BTC and now owned a total of 957.5 BTC.

item.title: Hyperliquid Sniper XPL Hedge Whale Address Floating P&L Reaches $2.63 Million Again
item.description: August 27th. According to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), as Hyperliquid's XPL witnessed a short-term upward surge once again. This morning, the main operation address 0xb9c...6801e, which the sniper hedged and earned more than 16 million US dollars. Its unrealized gains reached 2.63 million US dollars.Currently, the address still holds a 10.7 million US dollar 1x long position (with 13.68 million XPL held), and the entry price is $0.5901. When XPL just touched $0.99 earlier, the unrealized gains of this address once reached as high as 5.47 million US dollars.

item.title: A dormant whale address, inactive for 4 years, has transferred 500 BTC to Binance and still holds 3500 BTC
item.description: On August 27th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale address has just made a transfer of 500 BTC to Binance, with a value of $55.37 million.The wallet initially received 5,000 BTC four years ago (valued at $282 million at that time), and these assets originated from an address dating back 12 years ago when the Bitcoin price was only $322.The whale address still holds 3,500 BTC, with a value of $387 million.

item.title: Hyperliquid Response to XPL Price Surge: The platform has not experienced any technical issues or defaults. Users are advised to be aware of the risks themselves.
item.description: On August 27th, Hyperliquid's official announcement on the Discord channel stated that today, the XPL market witnessed significant volatility. The token price surged by approximately 2.5 times within a few minutes. During this period, the Hyperliquid blockchain operated normally as designed and there were no technical issues. Firstly, it carried out liquidations based on the order book, and then triggered the automatic deleveraging (ADL) mechanism in accordance with the public protocol. Hyperp adopts a fully isolated margin system where the PnL of all users is isolated from other asset positions. This liquidation and ADL only affected XPL positions, and the protocol did not incur any bad debts.The pre-market itself is unpredictable. The robust mark price formula used by Hyperp effectively prevents instantaneous price spikes. It requires the order book price to maintain a high level for several minutes before triggering liquidation.Hyperliquid is a permissionless multi-market protoc
